parameters.name: options.sourceLanguage
parameters.description: The BCP 47 code for the source language. Required.

parameters.name: options.targetLanguage
parameters.description: The BCP 47 code for the target language. Required.

parameters.name: options.onLanguageSupportCheck
parameters.description: Callback triggered after checking if the language pair is usable. Default: undefined.

returnValues.name: checkLanguageSupport
returnValues.description: Manually triggers a check for the configured language pair.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: Captures API errors or unsupported language exceptions.

returnValues.name: isLanguagePairSupported
returnValues.description: Result of the support check (null if not yet checked).

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: true if the browser supports the window.translator API.

returnValues.name: isTranslating
returnValues.description: true while the AI model is processing the translation.

returnValues.name: translate
returnValues.description: Triggers the translation process for the provided text.
